{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Reappropriate: Add {G} or {U}. [i](Exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i] [i](To reappropriate, exile exactly two cards from your hand and/or graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Before the Reclamation, the old lakes were drained to make room for tourist housing. Now, only moss awaits travellers there.[/i]
